id: This is a pool of any kind of security, and not therefore necessarily a pool of debt, though usually it is debt securities which are pooled.
name: This is a pool of any kind of security, and not therefore necessarily a pool of debt, though usually it is debt securities which are pooled.

id: Pools.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.

id: Pools.rdf version of this ontology was modified to move the definition of SpecialPurposeVehicle to this ontology to make it available for use more generally and augment the definition of an instrument pool with ownership.
name: Pools.rdf version of this ontology was modified to move the definition of SpecialPurposeVehicle to this ontology to make it available for use more generally and augment the definition of an instrument pool with ownership.

id: version of this ontology was modified to replace equity with owners equity in the definition of pool equity.

id: version of this ontology was modified to eliminate duplication with concepts in LCC.
name: version of this ontology was modified to eliminate duplication with concepts in LCC.

id: version of this ontology was modified to eliminate the deprecated concept for pool equity.
name: version of this ontology was modified to eliminate the deprecated concept for pool equity.

id: security that is included in a securities pool
name: security that is included in a securities pool

id: a pool consisting of debt instruments, such as bonds, loans or mortgages
name: a pool consisting of debt instruments, such as bonds, loans or mortgages

id: a pool of funds that a group of investors combines for common benefit
name: a pool of funds that a group of investors combines for common benefit

id: The pool may be a pool of almost anything, brought together for some purpose. It differs from a less formal collection in that there are facts defined about the constituents and the proportions of these in the pool. Modeling note: A constituent of a pool may have facts which vary over time (such as balances) but the basic nature of the thing as a member of the pool remains the same, along with some facts which vary over time but which have a value as of the time they become members of the pool.
name: The pool may be a pool of almost anything, brought together for some purpose. It differs from a less formal collection in that there are facts defined about the constituents and the proportions of these in the pool. Modeling note: A constituent of a pool may have facts which vary over time (such as balances) but the basic nature of the thing as a member of the pool remains the same, along with some facts which vary over time but which have a value as of the time they become members of the pool.

id: pool consisting of financial instruments that may be included in the same investment vehicle
name: pool consisting of financial instruments that may be included in the same investment vehicle

id: This ontology defines concepts related to high-level securities pools.
name: This ontology defines concepts related to high-level securities pools.

id: a collection of managed investments that are all managed by a single investment institution
name: a collection of managed investments that are all managed by a single investment institution

id: An investment club pools the funds of its members, giving them the opportunity to share in a portfolio offering greater diversification and the hope of a better return on their money than they could get individually.
name: An investment club pools the funds of its members, giving them the opportunity to share in a portfolio offering greater diversification and the hope of a better return on their money than they could get individually.

id: a pool of securities organized for the purpose of issuing notes against those securities
name: a pool of securities organized for the purpose of issuing notes against those securities

id: version of this ontology was modified to deprecate the concept of 'pool equity' which was not used elsewhere and was poorly defined and eliminate an improper restriction on managed investment.
name: version of this ontology was modified to deprecate the concept of 'pool equity' which was not used elsewhere and was poorly defined and eliminate an improper restriction on managed investment.

id: financial asset in the form of an instrument pool
name: financial asset in the form of an instrument pool

id: version of this ontology was modified to correct a logical inconsistency with respect to the representation of baskets.
name: version of this ontology was modified to correct a logical inconsistency with respect to the representation of baskets.

id: Barron's Dictionary of Finance and Investment Terms, Ninth Edition, 2014
name: Barron's Dictionary of Finance and Investment Terms, Ninth Edition, 2014

id: investment pool that is controlled by a professional investment manager who invests the pool in various financial instruments and assets that align with their investment objectives and is overseen by a board of directors
name: investment pool that is controlled by a professional investment manager who invests the pool in various financial instruments and assets that align with their investment objectives and is overseen by a board of directors
